item.title: Pack of Baus Secos Linshalm 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 9, 2025

Pack of Baus Secos Linshalm 1.54 ETS2

This mod was created with the intention of bringing you the dry trunk from Linshalm Implements. With 40 chassis options, you can run your truck from the 2-axle to the 30-meter bitrem.
I’ve created 32 carrier skins, for trailers, traffic and the freight market.
Accessories such as tail lights, tread plates and mudflaps that can be customized ingame (you can write your name), stickers on the cargo box, lanterns, suspensions and side protection are all present in this mod.
I’ve also made the traffic mod, where I’ve put together some configurations (not all of them). These same configurations will be present in the Freight Market.
For those who don’t know, the Freight Market is the game mode where you don’t need to have your own trailer, just go to the company and choose from the trailers in the game: the Linshalms, simple and bitrem.
I’m also bringing you SkinEdit, so that, with a simple image editor and a specific program, you can create your own skins and play with them. You can also edit the weight of the loads using it.

Credits: PAULO JUNIOR QRA DA FUMAÇA CLASSE A

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Mercedes Benz Axor 1840 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 9, 2025

Mercedes Benz Axor 1840 1.54 ETS2

Experience the power and reliability of the Mercedes-Benz Axor 1840 with this high-quality mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2! Designed for fans of realism and classic trucks, this mod brings the iconic Axor 1840 to life with detailed modeling and smooth performance.

Features:
High-quality exterior and interior modeling
Realistic engine sounds
Functional dashboard and animations
Multiple customization options (mirrors, bumpers, lights, etc.)
Compatible with most ETS2 versions
Smooth handling and realistic driving physics
Original Mercedes-Benz logo and branding
Whether you’re hauling across Europe or just exploring the roads, the Axor 1840 delivers an immersive and authentic driving experience. Perfect for those who appreciate the balance between comfort, strength, and style.

Credits: Eren

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: FIORINO 2017 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 9, 2025

FIORINO 2017 1.54 ETS2

The Fiat Fiorino 2017 mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.54 introduces a compact and versatile urban delivery van, widely utilized across Europe and Latin America. This mod features high-quality exterior and interior models, realistic engine sounds, smooth handling, and functional dashboard elements. It offers various customization options, including paint jobs, wheels, and accessories. Fully optimized for ETS2 1.54, this mod is ideal for players who enjoy light cargo transport and city driving.

Credits: paulo junior classe a

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Chevrolet c14 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 9, 2025

Chevrolet c14 1.54 ETS2

The Chevrolet C14 mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.54 introduces a classic pickup truck, bringing a vintage touch to your driving experience. This mod features a 4×2 chassis, two engine options, four transmission choices, two interior designs, and two steering wheel variants. It also offers various tuning options for personalization. Originally tested on game version 1.53, compatibility with version 1.54 has not been officially confirmed.

Credits: paulo junior classe a

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.

item.title: Peterbilt 387 v1.3.154 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 9, 2025

Peterbilt 387 v1.3.154 ATS

– 3 cabins;
– 5 chassis;
– Support for advanced coupling;
– Cable support;
– 7 engines;
– 26 checkpoints of Mack MDrive, Allison, Eaton Fuller and Meritor MaxiTorque;
– All engines and gearboxes with original parameters;
– Several interior options;
– 3 display options on the dashboard;
– Baked textures with high resolution;
– Complete set of wheels and tires;
– Realistic sound;
– DLC Cabin Accessories support;

Changelog:
Updating the registration of items from the Steam inventory (for the Cupid’s Express 2025, Cruising Missouri events);
Improving the registration of sound settings in the interior;
Minor registration edits;
Added side decorative pipes and neon lighting under the frame on a medium-length and short chassis.

Credits: Ch_Vitalik is an external model. Kirilloid22 - modification of the external model, external tuning, sounds, textures, modification of the sideboard. Dmitry68 - engines, gearbox. Gosha Motor - interior, texture modification of the exterior model, tuning, wheels, animation (completely new). Solaris36 - license plate models of the USA and Canada. vitalik062 is a set of registration plates from different European countries. il_86 - updating the mod to the current version of the game, bug fixes, and improvements. n1cky1992 - assistance in adapting mirrors to new physics. szeryff123 is the CB model of the Midland Alan 100 Plus radio station. TruckerStas (aka Classick) is a toolbox model. MuhaBZzz - 50 paints for the Sleeper cabin option. Frontiersman, Raven31211 - textures of IFTA, CCI stickers.

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.
